title: PM Svamitva Yojana Empowers Rural Andhra Pradesh with Legal Land Ownership
summary: The PM Svamitva Yojana is providing legal property rights to villagers in Andhra Pradesh using advanced drone technology, helping to resolve disputes and unlock financial opportunities for rural families.

title: Punjab Farm Groups Demand Cash Incentives Amid Stubble-Burning Crackdown
summary: As authorities intensify actions against stubble burning, farmer unions in Punjab are protesting and demanding the government provide cash incentives to help them manage crop residue sustainably.

title: Govt Promises Aid to Maharashtra Farmers Before Diwali After 'Biggest Calamity in 50 Years'
summary: Following devastating crop losses from heavy rains, the Maharashtra government has assured over 5 million farmers of financial assistance before Diwali, calling it the worst agricultural disaster in five decades.

title: National Mission on Natural Farming Aims to Enroll 1 Crore Farmers
summary: The Union Cabinet's National Mission on Natural Farming (NMNF) is set to promote chemical-free agriculture across 7.5 lakh hectares, with an outlay of ₹2,481 crore to support farmers in adopting sustainable practices.

title: World Food India 2025 Wraps Up, Securing Over ₹1 Lakh Crore in Investments
summary: The World Food India 2025 event concluded successfully, attracting unprecedented investment commitments and strengthening India's position as a global hub for food processing and agri-food value chains.

title: GEF's Food Securities Fund Scales Success in Sustainable Agriculture Globally
summary: The Global Environment Facility's Food Securities Fund is successfully unlocking financing for sustainable agriculture in developing markets, improving smallholder farmer livelihoods and promoting climate-resilient supply chains.
